Job Title: Software Engineer Intern

Location: San Jose, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About Us

One team. Global challenges. Infinite opportunities. At Viasat, we’re on a mission to deliver connections with the capacity to change the world. For more than 35 years, Viasat has helped shape how consumers, businesses, governments and militaries around the globe communicate. We’re looking for people who think big, act fearlessly, and create an inclusive environment that drives positive impact to join our team.

What You'll Do

Ground Infrastructure is responsible for the infrastructure that provides transport network, data (processing) centers and the networks within, access underlay infrastructure, and general shared services which are hosted in the data centers required to connect a subscriber to the internet.

Work we do includes:

Configure and manage Software Defined Networks (SDN). Maintain On-premises, Cloud, Infrastructure, and orchestration platforms for subscribers’ connectivity.Design and implement new core node architecture across the globes as we grow.Integrate and test with End-to-End systems to make sure basic functionalities working as expected.Implement live debugging and on-demand data visualizations as needed.


The day-to-day

We are hiring a group of interns to be a part of a collaborative team of engineers at Viasat within the Ground Infrastructure team. Examples of day to day tasks include:

Understanding various networking elements in our core nodes.Identify control/data path software performance bottlenecks within our platforms.Work on various AWS cloud platforms to implement various services.Design and implement web application to monitor and troubleshoot our Software Defined Networks.Integrate with Application team to make sure End to End system working with basic functionalities.Build some inhouse tools to investigate and debugs in the system.Automating deployments and configuration of tools and services. Collect system level metrics and data for network visualization.


What You'll Need

Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field.Experience complex scripting in Python and Bash.Experience automating configuration and tasks for highly scaled linux systems and application deployments.Understanding of basic Linux systems management.An understanding of RESTful web services, JSON, YML, CSS, and JavaScript.Experience with Ansible, Salt or Chef.A working knowledge of at least one high level OO language: Java, Ruby, C++, Objective C, Scala, Go, etc.Ability to commit to a 10-12 week summer internship starting in June 2024.


What Will Help You On The Job

Knowledge of common design patterns and OO principles.Familiarity with pipeline deployment tools such as Jenkins, GoCD or Bamboo.Basic knowledge on Networking is a plus.Ability to work both autonomously and with a team.


Salary range

$21 - $66 / hourly

At Viasat, we consider many factors when it comes to compensation, including the scope of the position as well as your background and experience. Base pay may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Additional cash or stock incentives may be provided as part of the compensation package, in addition to a range of medical, financial, and/or other benefits, dependent on the position offered. Learn more about Viasat’s comprehensive benefit offerings that are focused on your holistic health and wellness at careers.viasat.com/LifeAtViasat/Benefits.

EEO statement

Viasat is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, genetics, age, or veteran status or any other applicable legally protected status or characteristic. If you would like to request an accommodation on the basis of disability for completing this on-line application, please click here.

Experience Level (if available): None
